title: A direction for a publick profession in the church assembly, after private examination by the elders Which direction is taken out of the scripture, and points unto that faith and covenant contained in the Scripture. Being the same for substance which was propounded to, and agreed upon by the Church of Salem at their beginning. the sixth of the sixth moneth, 1629. In the preface to the Declaration of the Faith owned and professed by the Congregationall Churches in England. ...
author: Higginson, John, 1616-1708.
notes: Author's name and imprint from Wing.
Caption title; title from caption and opening words of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
